topic.title: help develop dex (kopy kate) more logins id
topic.body:
I am developing an improved and more decentralized big kopy kate site, I want to add more logins options, besides zeroid, I am putting CryptoID, which alias I tried to change leaving only CryptoID and is giving an error trying to save.

does anyone have somewhere explaining how to add new logins to the big kopy site for example
=======================
original pt-br

estou desenvolvendo um site do big kopy kate melhorado e mais descentralizado, quero adicionar mais opções de logins, alem do zeroid, estou colocando o CryptoID , que alias testei trocar deixando somente o CryptoID  e está dando um erro ao tentar salvar.

alguém tem algum lugar explicando como adicionar novos logins ao site big kopy por exemplo

topic.title: How to use Zeronet in Tor Browser (tutorial/faq)
topic.body:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DocsYf2tZVVMEMJFHiDsppmFicZCWkVv1/faq/#how-to-use-zeronet-in-tor-browser

How to Port Forward_Open Ports on a Wireless Router - Techneek TV
http://127.0.0.1:43110/15GACn5cumjT2RsN7NjfnUYuM2a96xN5aD/?Video=1574321640_18QeVKqxoh2nh8HK83T44dyTQ7YACNfNaU

nofish I added the video that was on youtube on zeronet on Big Kopy Kate 2 site, because I think EVERYTHING that can be related to zeronet, even more of tutorials, has to be inside it, to AVOID censorship, because I know that in china youtube is blocked already.

I know it is not much help, but it helps those who needed to see this video and could not access or did not want to access youtube, please if possible add it to the tutorial, this should help people who are suffering censorship around the world.

Thank you for your work.

========================================
original pt-br

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DocsYf2tZVVMEMJFHiDsppmFicZCWkVv1/faq/#how-to-use-zeronet-in-tor-browser

nofish Eu adicionei o video que estava no youtube na zeronet, no site Big Kopy Kate 2, pois acho que TUDO que puder que seja relacionado a zeronet, ainda mais de tutorais, tem que estar dentro da mesma, para EVITAR a censura, pois sei que na china o youtube é bloqueado já.

Sei que não é muito está ajuda, mas já ajuda quem precisava ver este video e não tinha como acessar ou não queria acessar o youtube, por favor se possivel adicione ele ao tutorial, isto deve ajudar pessoas que estão sofrendo censura pelo mundo.

Obrigado pelo seu trabalho.

does data.json from the users folder have any limits?

Because mine is not being downloaded by others on the site http://127.0.0.1:43110/15GACn5cumjT2RsN7NjfnUYuM2a96xN5aD/?Latest

ZeroNet-win-dist\data\15GACn5cumjT2RsN7NjfnUYuM2a96xN5aD\data\users\18QeVKqxoh2nh8HK83T44dyTQ7YACNfNaU\data.json



362/5000
Does anyone know if the data.json file in a site's users folder has any limits.

Because I increased the previous limit of the site kopy kate big and now I realize that my uploaded files are NOT visible.

The limit of this file seems to be less than 2 mega in the previous version of kopy kate big mine.

Does anyone know anything about it.

Thanks in advance for your help

1573781265_12GKd5hKKNsTyxWqE3arbSurnbq6E.body:
welcome to the real world my son, and complaining will improve zeronet?

NO, you have to create your own website, clone the website and leave it under TOTAL domain YOUR, this is one of the principles of zeronet, so you GUARANTEE that NO ONE will delete your material.

I'm tweaking a few things for example on the big kopy kate site, and I'm doing a version 2 of it, with mp3 support and decentralized login, because version 1 only supports the zeroid that already crashed last month and I can't run the risk of relying on something CENTRALIZED.

Other than that I want to increase the file size by users to about 4Terabytes.

I want to increase the current 2GB size to about 5GB per video and so on.

Like I have at least had no problems so far with the big kopy kate site taking this problem out of the centralized login system they use.

Other than that I think there is also a lack of playlist and audio support, I want to add mp3 and leave thumnails as background while playing the song or podcast

I hope to be able to finish these improvements this year yet.

==============================================================
original - pt-br


bem vindo ao mundo real meu filho, e ficar reclamando vai melhorar a zeronet ?

NÃO, tem que TU mesmo criar um site seu, clone o site e deixe ele sob TOTAL dominio TEU, este é um dos principios da zeronet, assim tu GARANTE que NINGUÉM vai deletar o TEU material .

Eu estou ajustando algumas coisas por exemplo no site big kopy kate, e estou fazendo uma versão 2 do mesmo, com suporte a mp3 e login DESCENTRALIZADO, pois a versão 1, só dá suporte ao zeroid que já deu pau mês passado e NÃO posso correr o risco de depender de algo CENTRALIZADO.

Fora que quero aumentar o tamanho de arquivos por usuários para uns 4Terabytes.

Quero aumentar o tamanho de 2GB atuais para uns 5GB por video e etc.

Tipo  eu pelo menos não tive problemas até agora com o site big kopy kate tirando este problema do sistema login centralizado que usam.

Fora que acho que falta também sistema de playlist e suporte a audio, quero adicionar mp3 e deixar as thumnails como fundo enquanto toca a musica ou podcast

Espero conseguir terminar estas melhorias este ano ainda.

Big Kopy Kate 2  http://127.0.0.1:43110/15GACn5cumjT2RsN7NjfnUYuM2a96xN5aD/?Home

supported login cryptoid and zeroid

==========================================

1574065256_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2.body:
yes, that's why Big Kopy Kate 2 I used cryptoid (decentralized) and also left it with zeroid support despite being centralized

Big Kopy Kate 2
http://127.0.0.1:43110/15GACn5cumjT2RsN7NjfnUYuM2a96xN5aD/?Home

================================================
tradução pt-br
sim, por isto Big Kopy Kate 2 eu usei o cryptoid(descentralizado) e também deixei com suporte ao zeroid apesar de ser centralizado

http://127.0.0.1:43110/kxonet.bit/?/kxoid

Differences From Other Id Providers
ZeroId accesses a clearnet server to ensure usernames are always unique. This server handles detecting of existing users as well as the signing of the user ids. Due to this, the server is easily inaccessible by blocking its IP address (China has already done this multiple times).

KaffieId is a fully decentralized Id Provider - Id Signature creation happens locally, on the computer doing the registration. Because of this, KaffieId does not ensure unique usernames.

KxoId uses a collection of Trusted Peer servers. Requests are given to and sent from these servers by broadcasting over the ZeroNet network using the PeerMessage plugin.

> [caropc10](#comment_17_1D5iCU5XE1D25ce2fV2XZqH95jGRtRaKZL): http://127.0.0.1:43110/kxonet.bit/?/kxoid [...]

Cryptoid is a fully decentralized Id Provider - Id Signature creation happens locally, on the computer doing the registration. Because of this, KaffieId does not ensure unique usernames.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/cryptoid.bit/

> [1bfqutudhtexlka](#comment_41_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2EhuAY): but can't this be spammed because of decentralized cert ?

I don't think this is the price of decentralization terms, I added support for cryptoid login myself, knowing this, that you can use this, but I will put the mute option on Big Kopy Kate 2, to minimize this, outside of which you can block the guy manually too

================================
original pt-br

eu não acho que este é o preço de termos DESCENTRALIZAÇÃO , eu mesmo adicionei suporte ao login cryptoid , sabendo disto, que podem usar isto, mas vou colocar a opção de mute no Big Kopy Kate 2 , para minimizar isto, fora que tu pode bloquear o cara manualmente também

http://127.0.0.1:43110/15GACn5cumjT2RsN7NjfnUYuM2a96xN5aD/?Home

> [1bfqutudhtexlka](#comment_42_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2EhuAY): if you add the mute function that would be a lot easierbtw , can you add support for different qualities ? like pushing a script to autoconvert file while uploading using ffmpeg or vlc ?that would attract a lot of low speed internet users like me :Dthanks for your effort  btw

Thanks for your support, this conversion using the browser is not a priority for me: /, as I advise people to use Format Factory, which I think would be faster to convert like this.

My priority will be to add the option to mute and seed the entire content of a channel, because I think this is missing, to help anyone who wants to help maintain the content of a specific channel without having to seed all files on the channel.

But thanks for trying to help.

========================================
original pt-br

Obrigado por seu apoio, está questão da conversão usando o navegador não é uma prioridade para mim :/ , pois aconselho o pessoal usar o Format Factory, que acho que seria mais rapido converter assim.

Minha prioridade vai ser adicionar a opção de mute e ser seed do conteudo todo de um canal, pois acho que falta isto, para ajudar quem quer ajudar a manter o conteudo de um canal especifico sem precisar ficar dando seed em TODOS os arquivos do canal.

Mas obrigado por tentar ajudar.

> [1bfqutudhtexlka](#comment_43_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2EhuAY): that would be great , best of luck



thanks: D and use it, I do not intend to censor anything and no one on it, so I will try to implement the mute option on it as soon as possible, it will be my priority

====================

original pt-br

obrigado :D e use-o , eu não prentendo censurar nada e ninguém nele, por isto vou tentar implementar a opção de mute nele o quanto antes, vai ser minha prioridade

> [styromaniac](#comment_1284_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): You have a name.yo address?

I do not have, and I think it is better to use the public address of bitcoin directly, I find it simpler, because if not later maybe you may have a problem using other things besides this, and I prefer to make as safe as possible and MAINLY as functional and durable as possible .

But thanks for asking my friend :) and use the site, I'm seeing here how to add the option to mute the site, because I do not want to remove any content, I'll just mute the user, as we have in zerome

=================================================================
original pt-br

não  tenho, e acho melhor usar direto o endereço publico do bitcoin, acho mais simples, pois se não depois talvez possa vir a ter problema usando outras coisas alem disto, e prefiro fazer do modo mais seguro possivel e PRINCIPALMENTE o mais funcional e duravel possivel.

Mas obrigado por perguntar meu amigo :) e use o site, estou vendo aqui como adicionar a opção de mute no site , pois não quero tirar o conteudo algum, vou apenas dar mute no usuário, como temos no zerome
